tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 6s, CD: 16s
Fire 3 special shots at random enemies, dealing 3.5x damage per shot. Each shot can crit, doesn't miss, and doesn't ignore armor

name: QBU-88
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 8s, CD: 16s
Active: After aiming for 1.5 seconds, deal 5x damage to the enemy with the highest hp and 1.5x damage to enemies within a radius of 1.5 units to that enemy.
Passive: Every 3rd shot on the same target deals 1.5x damage to enemies in a radius of 1.5 units

name: PA-15
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 6s, CD: 12s
Deal 4x damage to the highest HP enemy and stun for 3 seconds. If there are enemies within 2.5 horizontal units of the target, stun enemies within a radius of 2.5 and deal 2x damage. This skill can crit, doesn't miss, and doesn't ignore armor

name: HK33
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 4s, CD: 16s
Increase self rate of fire by 60% for 10 seconds

name: R93
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 6s, CD: 8s
Passive: Consecutive shots on the same enemy increase self rate of fire by 10% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Stacks reset upon changing targets.
Active: Increase self damage by 40% for 5 seconds, mark a target and attack only that target for 3 seconds, and do not reset passive stacks when changing targets

name: AS ValMod
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 5s, CD: 16s
Increase self damage by 200% (70% during daytime) for 6 seconds
tooltip_skill2: Passive: Upon receiving any damage buff, including fairy skills/talents, gain perfect accuracy for 3 seconds

name: StG44Mod
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 8s, CD: 16s
Launch a grenade that deals 5x/2x/1x damage to enemies within a 1/2.5/4 unit radius
tooltip_skill2: Passive: Increases base grenade damage by 20% and causes grenade to explode 3 times, dealing multiple hits to enemies standing in overlapping areas. (i.e. enemies in a 1 unit radius get hit 3 times)

name: Micro UziMod
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 3s, CD: 16s
Launch an incendiary grenade that deals 6.5x damage to enemies within a 1.5 unit radius and leaves a DoT that deals 1x damage every 0.33 seconds for 5 seconds in a 1.5 unit radius
tooltip_skill2: Passive: Incendiary Grenade marks enemies with a burn, dealing an extra 0.8x damage every 1.5 seconds as well as causing burned enemies to spread the burn mark in a 1 unit radius around them, lasting until the original incendiary effect ends

name: Dana
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 8s, CD: 18s
Jump up and smash the ground causing an explosion that deals 0.6x damage in a radius of 2 units. Skill damage increases by 1% for every 1 armor Dana has. Passive: Normal attack is an exploding rocket fist that deals 1.8x damage to 1 enemy with a 10% knockback chance.
Favorite Drink: Big Beer: Dana gains 0.5 shield for every 1 armor she has

name: Alma
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 8s, CD: 18s
Summon an extra 2 drones to attack with 40% damage each. Lasts 4 seconds.
Favorite Drink: Brandtini: Increase duration of extra drones by 1 second

name: Stella
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 6s, CD: 8s
Active: Increase self damage by 50% for 5 seconds.
Passive: After attacking 16 times, the next attack by her dolls will have +50% crit damage and target the furthest enemy.
Passive: Give Sei 10% cooldown reduction (does not affect initial cooldown)
Favorite drink: Bleeding Jane: Stella's passive will activate at 10 stacks instead

name: Sei
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 6s, CD: 10s
Active: Grant a 32 base hp shield to all ally SG, SMG, HG units that lasts for 5 seconds. Shield hp ranges from 0.8 to 1.8x the base value depending on enemy hp.
Passive: Sei's attacks count for Stella's passive.
Favorite Drink: Moonblast: Shield HP is doubled.

name: Jill
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 6s, CD: 16s
Spend 3 seconds mixing a drink. The drink that is made depends on her equipment. Each drink provides different buffs.
Passive: Jill cannot attack. For every 1 point of damage she has, decrease Jill's skill cooldown by 1% (up to 30%). Does not affect initial cooldown.
Big Beer (Flanergide, Bronson Extract, Karmotrine): Increase all SG armor by 20%, damage by 30%, and accuracy by 30% for 8s.
Brandtini (Adelhyde, Adelhyde, Powdered Delta): Increase MG damage and accuracy by 25% for 8s.
Piano Woman (Adelhyde, Bronson Extract, Karmotrine): Increase evasion by 60% for dolls in the front column, while increase damage by 20% for all other dolls. Lasts 8s.
Moonblast (Adelhyde, Adelhyde, Karmotrine): Increase all allies' rate of fire by 22% for 8s.
Bleeding Jane (Flanergide, Bronson Extract, Powdered Delta): Increase AR/RF crit chance by 25% for 8s. 60% of the critical chance above 100% becomes extra crit damage instead.
Fringe Weaver (Karmotrine, Karmotrine, Karmotrine): Increase all allies' damage by 35% for 5s. After the buff wears off, decrease all allies' damage and accuracy by 15% for 3s.
Sugar Rush (Any combination not listed already): Increase all allies' damage by 18% for 8s.

name: Dorothy
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 2s, CD: 1s
Activate the skill to switch between MIRD113 and Nano-Camouflage. By default, Dorothy will use Nano-Camouflage if she is in the middle row, MIRD113 otherwise.
MIRD113: Increase self damage by 100% and increase evasion by 80% for allies in her column while decreasing their accuracy by 40%. This effect does not trigger Python's passive.
Nano-Camouflage: Increase self evasion by 100% and increase accuracy by 80% for allies in her column while decreasing their evasion by 40%. This effect does not trigger Python's passive.
Favorite drink: Piano Woman: Reduces the debuffs caused by her skill by 50%

name: MP41
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 1s, CD: 16s
Launch a smoke grenade that decreases enemy rate of fire by 36% and movement speed by 50% within a radius of 2.5 units for 4 seconds

name: Type 4
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 6s, CD: 8s
Active: Increase self rate of fire by 55% for 5 seconds.
Passive: Every 3rd shot cannot miss and has a piercing effect, dealing 1x damage to the target and all enemies it passes through.

name: P30
tooltip_skill1:

Determination to Pursue: Increase all allies' movement speed by 60%

name: ADS
tooltip_skill1:
Initial CD: 5s, CD: 16s
Active: Launch a grenade that applies 5 stacks of [Corrosion] to the target, and 3 stacks to other enemies within a radius of 2.5 units of the target. Chance of applying [Corrosion] on normal attacks increases to 100% for 5 seconds.
Passive: Normal attacks have a 40% chance of applying 1 stack of [Corrosion] on the target. Upon receiving 5 stacks of [Corrosion], the enemy explodes for 6x damage and is stunned for 2.4 seconds and all stacks of [Corrosion] are removed.
[Corrosion]: Decrease target's rate of fire and movement speed by 6% for 5 seconds

name: T-CMS

tooltip_skill2: Passive: If the grenade kills the main target, deal 3.5x damage to enemies within a 4 unit radius. If the grenade does not kill the main target, deal 0.6x damage every 0.33 seconds and increase damage taken by the target by 20% for 3 seconds

name: Gr MP5Mod
tooltip_skill1:

tooltip_skill2: Passive: When skill1 expires, increase self evasion by 20% for 8 seconds for each enemy group present, stacking up to 3 times.

name: UMP9Mod

tooltip_skill2: Passive: If the main target of the stun grenade is stunned, increase damage of allies in the same column by 50% for 5 seconds. If the main target cannot be stunned or is already dead, increase evasion by 25% and apply a 25 hp shield to all allies in the same column for 5 seconds.

name: K3
tooltip_skill1:

AEnter sniper mode for 9 seconds. After every 1.5 seconds of aiming, deal 1.8x damage (able to crit, affected by armor, does not miss) to the furthest target and decrease their damage dealt by 15% for 3 seconds.

Activate to switch between penetration and assault mode. Penetration (default mode): Decrease self damage by 30% and armor penetration by 50%, but attacks pierce enemies. Assault: Increase self damage and accuracy by 20%
